price: Ва нисбат ба падару модараш накукор буд ва саркаш [-у] нофармон набуд
arabic: وَبَرَّۢا بِوَٰلِدَيۡهِ وَلَمۡ يَكُن جَبَّارًا عَصِيّٗا

version.title: Tajik translation - Arfy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tajik by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wabarran biwālidayhi walam yakun jabbāran ʿaṣiyyan
